类型: Style: Beautiful g**l you can do amazing things
评论详情: My friend bought me two different ones. Both are encouraging but one is also very funny reminder to not “hold onto” the negativity that comes up in my life.  There are a number of optional sayings. I recommend reading all of them before you decide which one to get. I wear my 2 all the time. With the saying on the inside, only you know what it says. Then you choose who to share it with. Otherwise it is a sturdy, yet flexible enough to open it to fit your wrist. It’s sleek & beautiful. When I’m having a difficult day, I need only to look at my wrist & say to myself the secret saying it holds.  Great inexpensive gift gift too. Great for white elephant parties & stocking stuffers too. If a friend is going through a difficult time, read through & see which one fits the situation. It will be uplifting to them & depending on which one you choose, will bring a chuckle to them as well!

类型: Style: Here's the thing
评论详情: I purchased a pair of Joycuff bracelets in 2018 as a Christmas present. I kept one, gave the other to my best friend. I have not taken it off since the day I got it. Literally not for one day. I shower in it, swim in it, ride my horse in it... you name it, this bracelet has done it. I've had a hard time with jewelry over the years because I'm someone who consistently wears the same pieces day in and day out. I worried when I order the original bracelets that they wouldn't hold up because they just seemed too good to be true. It still looks amazing. The black in the arrows on the outside has worn off some, but other than that still in fantastic shape! I ordered 3 new ones this week and I love them! Gifting 2 of them soon, keeping the third for myself. Do yourself, and your friends, a favor, buy Joycuffs! They are simply fantastic. Pictures of both bracelets!
